attributes.action: Ban people towing caravans on roads during daylight hours due to the tailbacks they cause
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People should be banned from towing caravans during daylight hours due to the tailbacks they cause, and anger and frustration as they never consider other motorists by pulling over to let us travel at the speed limit..!!! And they should pay additional road tax.
These people cause accidents by creating 'mobile chicanes'. Why dont they go to a boarding house/hotel/abroad..? Anything, JUST GET OUT OF THE WAY..!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
